response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. We are offering this remarkable piece to you at an exclusive price of $850,000. This is a unique opportunity to own a masterpiece that could potentially grow in value over time. We believe it aligns well with your interests and aspirations. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction and exceptional customer service. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this exceptional product with you.", "product_price": 850000}
